Title: Forget Her Not
Description:
The staff was made with the bough of a world tree, so the receptacle that the soul is transferred to needs to be comparable. Within the adverse conditions of Vakthros there may be a flower that is tenacious enough to grow.

However, it will be fragile given the circumstances. Find it, and then bring it to one of the green dragonflight's groves to help strengthen it.
ObjectivesText: Collect a Manaheart flower and bring it to the Ancient Bough to bloom.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Kalecgos at the Veiled Ossuary
